summary:
Mayor Oh Se-hoon attends the ‘Beautiful Artist Award’ - 

 Christine Vachon on Film Schools, First-Time Directors and the State of Cinema - 

 The short film 'Lola scissors' wins an award at the Vinaròs Festival -

 Richard Roundtree, the first black film hero, dies aged 81 -
